requirement.en: Send 1 Machine Type monster from your hand or 1 face-up Machine Type monster from your field to the Graveyard.

effect.en: Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, if an EARTH Attribute Machine Type monster(s) is among the cards sent, you can Special Summon 1 Level 7 EARTH Attribute Machine Type monster or any number of "Tamabot" from your Graveyard face-up to your field.
